about.title: About Me
about.description: I have a deep interest in subjects that directly or indirectly affect my life, such as politics and economics. Currently, I am focusing my efforts on programming, with an emphasis on back-end and big data.
about.philosophy: I believe that a good person is in the world to help solve problems. This philosophy led me to programming. I seek solutions on multiple fronts, valuing the ability to be useful in different areas.
about.career: I started my career as an intern in web development, but soon moved to the data area, where I remain today.
about.current: Currently, I work as a Senior BI Consultant at Kriptos, where I am responsible for developing and implementing Business Intelligence solutions, optimizing ETL processes, and data analysis to support decision-making.
about.education: I hold a bachelor's degree in Digital Games and a teaching degree in Pedagogy, as well as a postgraduate degree in Artificial Intelligence from PUC Minas and an MBA in Big Data and Competitive Intelligence from Descomplica.
about.hobby: In my free time, I enjoy researching vulnerabilities on websites and writing reports about them, such as my latest XSS finding on the Contagem city hall website. This practice helps me improve my programming and cybersecurity skills.
